TopicTitle: Mechjeb RCS usage seems very improved.

Articles.Content:
Maybe its just my idea but it seems it burns only when its needed compared to all the time.

I just wanted to make a post of appreciation of how useful and effective this mod has become over the years!

Thank you!

58 minutes ago, Boyster said:

I just wanted to make a post of appreciation of how useful and effective this mod has become over the years!

Seems like the appreciation would be better received if you put this in the actual mechjeb thread.
